game.name: Tyrant's Blessing
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 폭군에 의해 타이베리아는 전쟁도, 고통도, 죽음도 없는 낙원으로 변했습니다. 이곳의 모두가 언데드로 변해버렸기 때문입니다. 마지막으로 살아남은 전사를 지휘하여 턴제 전술 전투를 치르며 망자의 군대를 바다로 몰아넣으세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Tyberia has been turned into a paradise by the Tyrant, free from war, suffering, and death - because nearly everyone has been turned into the undead. Take charge of the last living warriors in tactical, turn-based battles and drive the Dead Army into the sea!

reviewHighlights.text: I'd like to say, I feel a lot of people don't see this how I see it. It's a random puzzle solver. Granted I know it sounds horrible, it kinda is, but...
One of those games, where you have to plot out every single goddamn turn or your basically losing, combined with some irritating mechanic, where after...
